name: Om's Awesome Clicker (by Om Gupta)
description:
"This is a clicker I made In Godot. I hope you like it. 

Click The colorful button in the center to get points! You can also upgrade an buy auto-clickers with your clicks. Upgrades increase the number of clicks you generate with each press of the button. Auto-clickers give you a click every second.

Now you can play my game!"

 - Om Gupta

This game was created by Om Gupta while he was doing a Godot game development camp at Code Wiz.
